title: Planet Labs gets U.S. Navy contract for maritime surveillance in the Pacific
summary: The company’s satellite imagery will be used for vessel detection and monitoring by the Naval Information Warfare Center Pacific

title: Rhea Space Activity to fly navigation payloads on lunar lander mission
summary: A company developing cislunar navigation systems has won a grant to test its technology on an upcoming commercial lunar lander mission.

title: The next Starship mission has a tentative launch date: March 14
summary: This third flight has a reasonable chance of success.

title: Launch the ORBITS Act
summary: The Senate unanimously passed the ORBITS Act for the second time, signaling that it's time to take orbital debris seriously.

title: Thaicom orders small GEO satellite from Astranis for a launch in 2025
summary: Thaicom has ordered a small geostationary satellite from Astranis for a launch in 2025 to provide broadband to some of the most remote and unconnected areas in Asia.
